newsitem.title: JAPAN: ATL Systems soars on Japan OTC market debut.
newsitem.headline: ATL Systems soars on Japan OTC market debut.

text.p: ATL Systems, which made its debut on the new second section of the over-the-counter market on Tuesday, drew an initial price of 319,000 yen, up 39,000 yen from the public offer price and continued to march higher, brokers said.
At 0139 GMT, the software maker's shares were at 422,000 yen after soaring as high as 473,000 yen.
The second section of the OTC market is designed to help aspiring venture businesses, including those with losses, go public through simpler registration procedures and requirements.
